name: Angry Robot: Wall Street Titan
description:
Selected by Indie Game Magazine as one of the best mobile arcade games of 2012!

Robo-stomp cars & tanks, squash the evil suits, and collect loot as judge, jury, and squashecutioner.

Featured in AppsGoneFree. Your daily free app resource.

* Physics based destruction and mayhem like you've never seen before!
* Tons of fun mini-objectives reward your wacky antics!
* Insane powerups make each game a new roboxperience!

Twenty five stories of giant robot, built to destroy and subjugate the masses. Reprogrammed by an anonymous hacktivist to turn on your evil corporate creators, you are the Wall Street Titan. Occupy Wall Street with a giant robot fist!


* What is the press saying? *

"...Wall Street Titan manages to be a deep arcade shoot ’em up that just happens to have a cool modern-day premise to boot."
Rating: 88/100 & Best of 2012
- Indie Game Magazine

"...like Burnout Crash with none of the initial Crash and all of the ensuing explosions."
- Hookshot, Inc.

"This game reinvents smash 'em up! GREAT stress reliever."
- 1Life2Play



** Lots of updates and improvements to come! **


Like WST on Facebook - facebook.com/wallstreettitan
Like us on Facebook - facebook.com/darktonicgames
Follow us on Twitter - twitter.com/darktonicgames
Check us out on YouTube - youtube.com/darktonic


Note: 3rd gen device users, we recommend closing all other apps before running Wall Street Titan.
